text: @NBCNews @DrOz Just a few days ago Dr. OZ told us all on TV that the Combination of hydroxychloroquine Z pack(AZITHROMYOSIN) and zinc Works very well when administered early and in the right dosages he also said just taking zinc every day helps to PROTECT from cold,flu,or COVID-19 ! @POTUS. 👍

entity.name: The Dr. Oz Show
entity.description: After five years as a health expert on "The Oprah Winfrey Show," Dr. Mehmet Oz gets an hour of his own each weekday to discuss viewers' health-and-wellness concerns. No subject is off-limits, as Dr. Oz addresses viewers' questions and talks to health experts about any and all topics, from sex to diet and exercise to diseases and ways to avoid them.
